dimensions: Warp x Weft: 260 x 79 cm (8 ft. 6 3/8 in. x 31 1/8 in.)
title: Rebozo
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: warp resist dyed before weaving (jaspe); warp-face plain weave; warp fringe with knotting
description: Between close-set narrow stripes, small geometric shapes make horizontal bands, all in indigo blue and white. Dark blue warp fringe, 15 inches deep in elaborate knotting, pattern of bands and rosettes.
name: Rebozo
